oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Rain-maker and Sorcerer, /kaunu. (L VIII.-31. 8759-8762, 8743 rev., 8748 rev.). The !gixa (sorcerer) called |kaunu was an old 'Mountain Bushman' and was killed by his grandson, !kauken-ta-|a, with an arrow. 1) p.8758v: translated (by Lloyd) on the 5 May 1882, 2) p.8761v: |xam names for seasons, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-31.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !gixa (sorcerer) |kaunu
